content.rendered:
Travel. Explore. Indulge. Live.

indulge, like never before

Redefine luxury with timeless beauty surrounding your stay at the Royal Retreat Resort & Spa. Nestled in the Badi village, overlooking the mighty Aravalli ranges, allow us to treat you to our regal hospitality complemented by classical art and architecture, and an abundance of nature’s gifts.

In-house Experiences

Chef's Table

Join us for an exclusive culinary treat with the executive Chef who curates off-the-menu dishes for you and yours, bringing together their expertise and flair with the choicest ingredients.

Couple Dinner by the pool

Allow us to make your special moments even more memorable with a candlelight dinner by the serene poolside overlooking the majestic Aravallis.

Personalized Dinner on the chariot

Travel back in time to the grandeur and opulence of the Vijayanagar dynasty in this ancient chariot dating back to the 18th century with a unique dining experience and curated menu.

Wine & cheese tasting at Jaguar Patio

Find yourselves transported to the Côte d’Azur with a sublime symphony of perfectly paired wine and artisanal cheeses, served at the striking marble patio in the Jaguar block.

Antiquing

The beating heart of our resort property and creative expression, Mayur Arts boasts a community of connoisseurs and clients globally since 1977 offering a rare collection of antiques in silver, wood, brass as well as miniature paintings and pichwais collected from various states of India.

Visit Mayur Arts Website

Shopping arcade

The one-stop-shop for all your souvenirs from Udaipur and Rajasthan, the shopping arcade is a handpicked selection of high quality and artisanal handicrafts, textiles, and jewellery.

Massage by the pool

Guests at our property can revel in a relaxing massage and other spa treatments by the poolside, while soaking in the delicate fragrance of frangipani and honeysuckle.

Cooking Demonstration

Our guests can take more than memories back with them by learning the secrets of age-old Rajasthani recipes from our local chefs themselves! Please note that all food safety protocols have to be observed by guests at all times.

cocktail tasting by mixologist

Ever tasted what fame and glory taste like? Our mixologist can help you by taking your favourite ingredients, smells and flavours, and presenting some of the best cocktails for you and yours!

gardening

Enveloped in lush greens, this 12-acre property has over 250 varieties of plants. Try a dab hand at gardening and interact with our groundskeepers and horticulturists to discover the verdant secrets of Badi soil.

In and around

Looking for some unforgettable experiences during your stay?
